price: 42. Allah Sait bien tout ce qu’ils invoquent en dehors de Lui. Il est le Tout-Puissant, le Sage.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مِن شَيۡءٖۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha yaʿlamu mā yadʿūna min dūnihi min shayin wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
